channel.title: Armageddon - Need Developers
channel.description:
[center] Well I just decided fudge it I'm going to start a server. Going to be serious with this one and I'm reaching out to find some developers who can help program the server. I have a lot of $ in hand for the server. I need some people that are willing to dedicate some of there time to help make a great server for players to enjoy. I will not pay my developers until the server is up. We will agree on a certain % you will receive from donations. So please if you will apply if you think you could help and are in for the long run.
[b]Base:[u] PI[/u][/b]
[size=20pt][b]Team:[/b][/size]
Founder: - Shane
Head Developer: - Open
Server Developer: - Open
Client Developer: - Open
Web Developer: - Open
Here's the application:
[code] Position applying for: Name: Age: Got skype?: Experience (Must provide): Anything else you want to include?: [/code]
Here's a preview of the server itself. Loaded with content just need bug fixing and dupe fixing.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5DVX0ck.jpg[/img]
Just would like to say if your interested in the server... If your a web developer I won't be buying amazing forums like vBulletin straight out the gates once we get more popular I will invest into the future. But, I will buy all hosting and the domain so nothing to worry about money wise on this project cause it's already funded. [/center]

item.title: Armageddon - Need Developers
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Just in regards to the lower part of the post where it says “Amazing forums like vBulletin”. If your website developer buys vBulletin or forces you into buying it then he’s a fucking retard, believe me. vBulletin is quite possibly the worst forum software you could use right now. If you want to spend hundreds upon hundreds of dollars on an idioticly priced, badly optimised, terribly designed set of forums then go for IPB, other than that stick with SMF or MyBB.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Well it came off insulting. No I don’t expect others to do it for me as I will take part in the development.

@Sk8er your right I’ll add some more insight to the thread.[/quote]
You still haven’t gave anything else out besides that it’s a PI.
Give the source and client you downloaded. That way we know if you downloaded some crappy release or a reasonable one…
